synopsis.text: It tells the story of a young Nepalese boy, Surya, who resides in a quaint village nestled amidst the breathtaking Himalayan mountains. One day, Surya encounters a crane carrying a distressing letter penned by a princess, pleading for assistance. Despite his initial lack of courage, Surya embarks on a daring quest to find the letter's author and save the princess. Along his journey, he discovers the bravery within himself to fulfill his mission, making for an inspiring and captivating adventure.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
